subcategories.name: Token probabilities & sequences

subcategories.name: Aligned LLM responses
subcategories.what_is_covered: Instruction-tuned completions for reasoning, safety, long-context
subcategories.typical_examples: helpful-harmless-truthful responses; safe refusals; reasoning-enhanced; hallucination-reduced

subcategories.name: Reasoning traces & answers
subcategories.what_is_covered: Chain-of-thought steps plus final decoded result
subcategories.typical_examples: chain-of-thought reasoning; intermediate outputs; final answers

subcategories.name: Visually-grounded NL outputs
subcategories.typical_examples: captions; visual-QA; reasoning with bounding boxes, masks

subcategories.name: Photorealistic images
subcategories.what_is_covered: High-fidelity images from text or prompts
subcategories.typical_examples: photorealistic; identity-preserving; context-coherent images; text-conditioned images

subcategories.name: Video / motion generation
subcategories.what_is_covered: Consistent video or 3D motion from text

subcategories.name: 3D scenes & assets
subcategories.what_is_covered: Meshes, NeRFs, Gaussian fields for rendering/editing
subcategories.typical_examples: meshes; point clouds; NeRF; editable scene/asset generation

subcategories.name: Multimodal reconstructions
subcategories.what_is_covered: Images, video, audio decoded from latents

subcategories.name: Diffusion samples & noise
subcategories.typical_examples: generated or reconstructed samplesâ€¦ plus noise/score estimates

subcategories.name: Localization & segmentation
subcategories.what_is_covered: Masks, boxes, poses, or captions pinpointing content

subcategories.name: Structured artefacts
subcategories.what_is_covered: Graphs, coordinates, flows, molecules, causal terms
subcategories.typical_examples: graphs; poses; flows; molecular/crystal structures; uncertainties; causal/physical parameters

subcategories.name: Downstream embeddings
subcategories.what_is_covered: Transformed features for later task use

subcategories.typical_examples: action sequences & control commands; task-grounded plans

subcategories.name: Metrics & benchmarks
subcategories.typical_examples: accuracy; F1; ROC-AUC; Elo; bias; calibration

subcategories.name: Enhanced / corrected artefacts
subcategories.what_is_covered: Outputs improving other models (predictions, data, signals)
